_Explicacion.en_que_nos_vamos_a_basar: What are we going to base on?
_Explicacion.preguntas: Then we are going to ask you some questions... and we will also test you! Do not worry, it will cost you less than 5 minutes. Thanks to this you will be sure your training is agreed at your current level and knowledge
_Explicacion.objetivo: What is the goal of this?
_Explicacion.reevaluacion_objetivo: The goal of retesting is to help people who did not used for a while the app and they want to start using again. Imagine you started with no-experience and a high BMI, and we made a training program for you. For any reason you stopped using our app and now you come back but you are no longer so inexperienced, you would like to adapt your program to your new circumstances. We have already thought of you!
_Explicacion.¿cuanto_tiempo_llevas_entrenando?:
How long have you 
 being training?
_Explicacion.advertencia1: If you proceed, your future level could be lower than your current level. (This could make sense if you trained once during a whole month with the app, then you left us, and now you want a fresh start from scratch, for example. If that is your case, continue)
_Explicacion.advertencia2: Previously, you achieved a higher level, you have access to full app functions, in case you retest yourself you will not be in a higher level, this will be the same or lower (doing the training stage again). (This could make sense if you trained once during a whole month with the app, then you left us, and now you want a fresh start from scratch, for example). If that is your case, continue

_Result.formacion_3_meses:
The EntrenaAPP team has determined that you must go through a training period of 3 months (you enter phase 1/3 of the training) with progressively harder workouts. Once you finish this period, you will be ready to use all the functionalities of the application. 
 
Next we are going to show you a short guide to use and you will be ready to configure your training and start to progress for real!
_Result.formacion_2_meses:
The EntrenaAPP team has determined that you must go through a training period of 2 months (you enter phase 2/3 of the training) with progressively harder workouts. Once you finish this period, you will be ready to use all the functionalities of the application. 
 
Next we are going to show you a short guide to use and you will be ready to configure your training and start to progress for real!
_Result.formacion_superada:
The EntrenaAPP team has determined that you are ready to access all the functionalities of the application, according to the experience and knowledge you have. Congratulations! 
 
 You have obtained {}. 
 
 Next we are going to show you a small guide to use and you will be ready to configure your training and start to progress for real!

_Tutorial.explicacion_cuestionario:
The next thing you are going to do when you finish watching this little guide is access this questionnaire.
 
 1) Choose number of days, material you have for train, if you want to prioritize ant muscle group etc 
 
 2) If you dont check any of the last 2 options, you will get the structured tranig routine for you with the exercises selected by defoault. 

 3) If you check one of the two: 
 
 -The one marked in red will allow you to access the training structure designed for you and selected the exercises that best suit you based on the movement pattern. 
 
 -The one marked in yellow will allow you to create a training from 0. (**This option is only recommended if you have a coach or if your knowledge is advanced and you do the training routines yourself.)
_Tutorial.explicacion_que_puedo_hacer:
You already have your training! 
 
 1) Click on the button to access it. 
 
 2) Where the red arrow indicates you can edit the training.
 
 3) By pressing where the blue arrow indicates, you access your training 

 4) By pressing where the pink arrow indicates, you access the agenda to record the load and the repetitions performed for each series. 

 5) By clicking where the green arrow indicates, you access the detail page of the exercise. 
 
 -In the detail page you can see the muscles you work, take note there in the agenda, activate the chronometer and ...! even change the exercise for another biomechanically similar !.
_Tutorial.que_mas_explicacion:
No, you haven't even seen 50% of the app yet... 

 1) Press where the yellow arrow indicates and access the global statistics of your training: 
 
 - Number of series of each muscle group. 
 
 - Work distribution. 
 
 - Work frequency of each muscle group 
 
 2)Press where the red date indicates and access the specific statistics of each muscle group.
_Tutorial.ademas_explicacion:
-¡Get points!. Yes, the app is free, but some non-essential features cost points. You can get these points for free (watching ads, sharing the application on instagram etc), buy them or you can go premium and the application works without points (and even without an internet connection!). 
 
 -Access our community. It's free and you will be able to meet and learn from people who share your same passion! 
 
 -Enter our store and ask your questions to find honest advice. At Entrenaapp we prefer to win a client to make a sale.

_Cuestionario.no_maxima_congestion: I felt that I did not reach maximum congestion after workouts, perhaps a slight increase in volume and intensity of work would be optimal
_Cuestionario.apenas_sentia_trabajo: I hardly felt work and I need a substantial increase compared to the previous mesocycle

_Sobre_mi.conoce_al_creador: Meet the creator of the app!
_Sobre_mi.sobre_mi_explicacion:
My first contact with the gym was at the young age of 16, a world that has helped me to be a very disciplined person in everything I do. 
 
After several years of training and progressive progress, I progressed until I reached the highest level as a member of the Spanish natural bodybuilding team, winning the world championship at 24 years old. 
 
 My greatest motivation is to apply science together with more than a decade of experience in the fitness sector to improve people's health, always faithful to my principles and in a natural way.
_Sobre_mi.explicacion_que_puedo_hacer:
You already have your training! 
 
 1) Click on the button to access it. 
 
 2) Where the red arrow indicates you can edit the training. 
 
 3) By pressing where the blue arrow indicates, you access your training. 

 4) By pressing where the pink arrow indicates, you access the agenda to record the load and the repetitions performed for each series. 

 5)By clicking where the green arrow indicates, you access the details page of the exercise. 
 
 -On the detail page you can see the muscles you work, point from there in the agenda, activate the stopwatch and ... even change the exercise for another biomechanically similar!.
_Sobre_mi.mensaje_carlos: Hello Carlos, I would like to know more information about your way of working and rates.

_Card_Ejercicio.rir_explicacion: RIR are the repetitions that we have left in chamber. That is, the repetitions that we have to do in an exercise to reach muscle failure. Let's imagine that we are able to perform with 50 kilos 8 repetitions of the bench press to failure. If in our program they tell us that we must work with RIR 2 for 6 repetitions, the weight we will handle will be 50 kilos since we could do 8, but they indicate that we must leave 2 repetitions "in the chamber".

_Ejercicios.hombro_posterior_en_cruce_de_poleas_alto: Cable standing cross over high reverse fly
_Ejercicios.pájaro_posterior_con_banda_elástica: Band bent over rear lateral raise
_Ejercicios.press_militar_con_trx: Suspension handstand push up upper arms
_Ejercicios.abducción_horizontal_de_hombro_con_mancu: Dumbbell lying on floor rear delt raise
_Ejercicios.pájaro_con_trx_tumbado: Suspension reverse fly wake up back
_Ejercicios.curl_concentrado_con_mancuerna_apoyado_e: Dumbbell standing one arm curl (over incline bench)
_Ejercicios.curl_de_bíceps_con_kettlebell_agarre_rev: Kettlebell double alternating hang clean forearms
_Ejercicios.press_francés_con_barra_recta: Barbell decline close grip to skull press
_Ejercicios.introduce_un_apunte: Insert a note for this exercise
_Ejercicios.press_cerrado_con_trx: Suspension close grip chest press chest
_Ejercicios.sentadilla_búlgara_con_bandas_elásticas: Band one arm single leg split squat
_Ejercicios.prensa_horizontal_en_máquina_con_pies_ab: Lever seated squat calf raise on leg press machine
_Ejercicios.puente_de_glúteos_a_una_pierna: Glute bridge one leg on floor
_Ejercicios.extensiones_de_glúteo_a_una_pierna: Glute bridge one leg on bench
_Ejercicios.sentadilla_búlgara_con_bandas_elásticas_: Band one arm single leg split squat (gluteal emphasis)
_Ejercicios.gemelo_en_prensa_inclinada: Sled calf press on leg press
_Ejercicios.gemelo_de_pie_con_carga_externa: Standing calf raise with external load
_Ejercicios.gemelo_sentado_con_carga_externa: Seated calf raise with external load
_Ejercicios.hombro_posterior_en_cruce_de_poleas: Cable standing cross over high reverse fly
_Ejercicios.curl_concentrado_en_banco_inclinado_con_: Dumbbell standing one arm curl (over incline bench)

_Dia_Entrenamiento_Model.dia_de_pierna_enfasis_femoral_gluteo: Leg day (Femoral / Gluteal Emphasis) + Lateral shoulder
_Dia_Entrenamiento_Model.tecnica_1_1/2: 1-1/2 Technique You go up, down halfway, up and down all the way down, that's one rep.
_Dia_Entrenamiento_Model.en_superserie_con_el_siguiente_ejercicio: In superset with the following exercise
_Dia_Entrenamiento_Model.triserie_con_los_siguientes_ejercicios: Triset with the following two exercises.
_Dia_Entrenamiento_Model.1_de_parada_abajo: 1" from stopping down (without resting the arm on the body)
_Dia_Entrenamiento_Model.triserie: Triset with lateral raises and flat press.

_Patron_Model.empuje_horizontal: We work the pectoralis major with emphasis on the sternocostal bundle with a horizontal push exercise.
_Patron_Model.empuje_inclinado: We work the pectoralis major with emphasis on the clavicular bundle with an inclined bench push exercise.
_Patron_Model.empuje_declinado: We work the pectoralis major with emphasis on the sternocostal bundle with a horizontal push exercise on a declined bench.
_Patron_Model.flexion_de_hombro_abduccion_horizontal: Work of the pectoralis major with emphasis on the clavicular bundle with exercise of shoulder flexion and horizontal adduction. We also put a lot of work on the front delts when doing a shoulder push-up.
_Patron_Model.aduccion_horizontal: Work of the pectoralis major (specifically the sternocostal bundle) with horizontal adduction exercise.
_Patron_Model.aduccion_de_hombro_y_aduccion_horizontal: Work of the pectoralis major (specifically the sternocostal bundle) with shoulder adduction and horizontal adduction exercises.
_Patron_Model.bisagra_de_cadera: Exercise based on the hip hinge movement with which we work the entire posterior chain of the body (back, femoral, trapezius, posterior shoulder etc).
_Patron_Model.aduccion_de_hombro: Work of the wide dorsal muscle (specifically this movement pattern is the best for working the lower part of the dorsi) with a shoulder adduction movement
_Patron_Model.extension_de_hombro_flexion_de_codo: Wide dorsal muscle work (specifically this movement pattern is best for working the upper wide dorsal mucle) with a shoulder extension movement
_Patron_Model.aproximacion_de_escapulas: Work of the upper part of the back (middle trapezius, rhomboids, back shoulder etc)
_Patron_Model.extension_de_hombro_sin_flexion_de_codo: Work of the wide dorsal muscle (specifically this movement pattern is the best for working the upper part of the wide dorsal muscle) with a shoulder extension movement in which the elbow is also not flexed as in a dumbbell row, for example.
_Patron_Model.aduccion_y_extension_de_hombro: Movement that combines adduction with shoulder extension with which we work the wide dorsal muscle.
_Patron_Model.extension_de_hombro_y_aproximacion_de_es: Movement that combines the shoulder extension with the scapular approach to work the scapulae approximators together with the wide dorsal muscle.
_Patron_Model.empuje_vertical: Work the anterior deltoid with an overhead push exercise.
_Patron_Model.flexion_de_hombro: Shoulder flexion movement to work the anterior deltoid.
_Patron_Model.hombro_lateral_tension_constante: Work of the lateral head of the deltoid with constant tension.
_Patron_Model.hombro_lateral_acortamiento: Work of the lateral head of the deltoid in shortening.
_Patron_Model.hombro_lateral_estiramiento: Lateral deltoid head work in stretch.
_Patron_Model.abduccion_horizontal: Horizontal abduction movement to work the posterior deltoid.
_Patron_Model.biceps_hombro_flexion: Work the biceps (especially the short head) with the shoulder flexed.
_Patron_Model.biceps_hombro_anatomico: Work of the biceps with the shoulder in anatomical position
_Patron_Model.biceps_hombro_extension: Work the biceps (especially the long head) with the shoulder in extension
_Patron_Model.empuje_cerrado: Triceps work with close grip push exercise.
_Patron_Model.triceps_hombro_flexion: Triceps work (emphasis on the medial head) with the shoulder flexed.
_Patron_Model.triceps_hombro_extension: Triceps work (emphasis on long head) with shoulder extension
_Patron_Model.extension_de_rodilla_con_extension_de_ca: Work the quadriceps (also the hamstrings and glutes) with a heavy exercise that combines knee and hip extension.
_Patron_Model.extension_de_rodilla_pesada: Quadriceps work with a heavy knee extension exercise.
_Patron_Model.extension_de_rodilla_ligera: Quadriceps work with a light knee extension exercise.
_Patron_Model.flexion_de_rodilla: Hamstring workout with knee flexion based exercise.
_Patron_Model.extension_de_cadera_rodilla_fija: Hip extension movement keeping the knees rigid or semi-rigid to prioritize the work of the hamstrings over the gluteus
_Patron_Model.extension_de_cadera_con_carga_axial: Exercise based on hip extension with axial load prioritizing the gluteus maximus work over the hamstrings.
_Patron_Model.extension_de_cadera_con_carga_horizontal: Exercise based on hip extension with horizontal load prioritizing gluteus maximus work.
_Patron_Model.extension_de_cadera_ligero: Light exercise based on hip extension to work the gluteus maximus.
_Patron_Model.abduccion_de_cadera: Light exercise based on hip abduction to work the gluteus medius.
_Patron_Model.aduccion_de_cadera: Light exercise based on hip adduction to work the adductors.
_Patron_Model.gemelo_rodilla_extendida: Calf exercise with the knee extended to work both the soleus and the gastrocnemius.
_Patron_Model.gemelo_rodilla_flexionada: Calf exercise with the knee flexed to emphasize the work of the soleus since when flexing the knee we deactivate the gastrocnemius.
_Patron_Model.flexion_de_columna: Rectus abdominis work with spinal flexion exercise (or spinal extension).
_Patron_Model.rotacion_de_tronco: Work of the oblique muscles with trunk rotation exercise (or anti-rotation of this one).
